text: Mu sa [zhu 1] cong ta de zuren zhong tiaoxuanle qishi ren fu wo de yuejian. Dang tamen zao da dizhen qinxi shi, ta shuo:â€œWo de zhu a! Jiaru ni yiyu, ciqian ni jiu huimie tamen he wole. Nandao ni yaoyin women zhong de yuren suo fan de zui'e er huimie women ma? Zhe zhishi ni [dui women] de kaoyan, ni yi ci shi ni suo yiyu zhe mi wu, ni yi ci yindao ni suo yiyu zhe zunxing zhengdao. Ni shi women de baohu zhe, qiu ni kuanshu women, qiu ni ci min women, ni shi zui hao de kuanshu zhe [zhu 2].
